title: AlmaLinux 10 Beta Supports Older x86 Chipsets
author: Jack Wallen
description: AlmaLinux 10 comes with a new sudo system role for simplifying config management and Sequoia PGP tools for more advanced encryption.
cntitle: AlmaLinux 10 Beta版支持较旧的x86芯片组
cndescription: AlmaLinux 10自带新的sudo系统角色，用于简化配置管理，以及Sequoia PGP工具，用于更高级的加密。
